build: -> -> ->

details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Soul Seeker – Make Up
  • Soul Seeker – Reinforce OR Piercing Soul Seeker
  • Finale Ribbon – Cooldown Cutter
  • Trinity – Extra Strike
  • Trinity – Reinforce OR Piercing Trinity
    • Go for extra %Ignore DEF if you need more (min. 90% IED)

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

primary.name: Soul Buster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 2, Hold the attack key to fire Eskalade's power forward\nCan be used while moving. Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 60%
primary.desc: Holding the Attack Key fire bullets forward
details: Can move while attacking

primary.name: True Heart Inheritance
primary.shortDesc: Soul Shooter Mastery: +10%
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest '[Skill] Pink Power Superstar'

primary.name: Grappling Heart
primary.shortDesc: Move to the nearest platform above you.\nPress jump while moving to cancel.

primary.name: Terms and Condition
primary.shortDesc: +120% skill damage for 10 sec when active\nCooldown: 60 sec. Skill effects reduced to half when used with link skill.
details: Angelic Buster gains a bigger damage increase compared to the linked version
Can be found in the Link Manager

primary.name: Day Dreamer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Return to the Lovely Buster Suite\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: Once teleported, exiting the map will move you to Pantheon

primary.name: Dress-up
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Transform into Angelic Buster\nWhen used as Angelic Buster, transform back into Tear.
primary.desc: Switches between your normal form and transformed form
details: Using attacks will automatically transform you

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest '[Skill] Pink Power Superstar'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: On Stage
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, plays up to 5 tracks from Angelic Buster's album\nMovement ends the concert, only usable in town\nCooldown: 1 hour
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest '[Skill] On Stage'

primary.name: Star Bubble
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Max enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Fires a blast of bubbles forward

primary.name: Feather Hop
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Melody Cross
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +2500, Max MP: +2000, Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Affinity Heart
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Max Speed: +25, Jump: +20

primary.name: Lovely Sting
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 4

primary.name: Pink Pummel
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 11, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 4 while moving
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies

primary.name: Soul Shooter Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Soul Shooter Mastery: +50%, Attack Power +20

primary.name: Beautiful Soul
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +40, Final Damage: +5%

primary.name: Affinity Heart II
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%, Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +25%

primary.name: Power Transfer
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -50%

primary.name: Soul Seeker
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 19, Number of Essences: 2\nEssence Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 1 until the max attack count is reached or it disappears\nChance for Essence to Respawn on Hit: 85%, Number of Attacks: 7
primary.desc: Throw orbs that seek out and attack nearby enemies
details: After hitting an enemy, there is a chance to create another Soul Seeker at its location (up to 7 times)
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first
Ignores by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Star Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Blades strike down from above onto enemies in front of you

primary.name: Iron Blossom
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +40%, DEX: +20, Final Damage: +14%

primary.name: Dragon Whistle
primary.shortDesc: Attack +40, Ignore Defense: +16%, Critical Damage: +6%

primary.name: Love Me Heart
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +1000, Max MP: +1000, DEF: +1000, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Affinity Heart III
primary.shortDesc: DEX: +40, Damage: +10%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Center Stage
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +15%

primary.name: Celestial Roar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 580%, Number of Attacks: 4\nStun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 3 sec
primary.desc: Fires a shockwave forward that has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Trinity
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 23, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 630%, Number of Attacks: 6\nTrinity/Trinity Fusion Damage and Ignore Defense: +15%, Duration: 30 sec, Max Stacks: 2
primary.desc: Unleashes a barrage of strikes forward
details: Upon successful hits, grants a stacking buff that increases Trinity's (including enhanced 5th Job version) %Damage and %Ignore DEF (up to 2 stacks)

primary.name: Finale Ribbon
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 400%, Number of Attacks: 10\nDamage Over Time: 30%, Damage Duration: 60 sec, Damage Interval: 1 sec, Party Member Damage (Excluding Angelic Buster): +20%\nCooldown: 40 sec
primary.desc: Swings ribbons that form a gigantic attack that debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes damage over time and receives increased %Damage from party members (excluding Angelic Buster)

primary.name: Soul Seeker Expert
primary.shortDesc: 35% chance to create Soul Seeker when using Angelic Buster skills (excluding Soul Buster, Soul Seeker, and Superstar Spotlight)\nCelestial Roar and Trinity Creation Chance: +25%\nAutomatically created Soul Seekers deal 75% damage of directly craeted Soul Seekers
primary.desc: While toggled, successful attacks have a chance to activate
details: Deals reduced %Final Damage compared to manually using
or have an increased chance to create Soul Seekers
, , and will not create Soul Seekers
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Soul Resonance
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Invincibility Duration: 2 sec
Hold down the key to continuously attack up to 10 enemies, for 145%, 5 times.
Hold for at least 8 sec to make a final blow that deals up to 600% damage 5 times based on the time held. Boss Damage: +50%
While casting, any Max HP scaling damage taken is reduced by 35%.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Create a vortex that damages enemies within it
details: Upon casting, you are briefly invincible

At the end of the duration, unleash a massive explosion
  • Based on how long the skill was held, the damage increases
While casting, take reduced damage (including %Max HP attacks) and you cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Deals increased %Damage to bosses

primary.name: Star Gazer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Critical Damage: +20%, Duration: 180 sec

primary.name: Nova Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec.

primary.name: Nova Temperance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Soul Shooter Expert
primary.shortDesc: Soul Shooter Mastery: +70%\nAttack Power: +30, Final Damage: +21%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage

primary.name: Affinity Heart IV
primary.shortDesc: Angelic Buster skill damage (excluding Soul Seeker Expert and Grand Finale: Cheering Balloons): +25%, Duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks (excluding and - Cheering Ballons) grant a %Damage buff
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

hyperActive.name: Pretty Exaltation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Final Damage: +5%, Duration: 20 sec
Chance to Create Soul Seeker Expert: 15%, Chance to Respawn Soul: 5%, Number of Soul Seekers Created: +2
Soul Seeker Final Damage: -45%, multiplied with Soul Seeker Expert's Final Damage reduction effect
Cooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Increases %Final Damage and enhances
details: While active, increases the number of Soul Seekers created, the chance to create and recreate but, further reduces the %Final Damage penalty (multiplicative)

hyperActive.name: Supreme Supernova
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Energy Orb Duration: 12 sec\nEnergy Orb Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 3\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates an energy orb that damages enemies within it
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: Final Contract
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, Duration: 30 sec
Attack Power: +50, Damage: +10%, Ignore Defense: +30%, Boss Damage: +20%, Critical Rate: +30%
Abnormal Status Resistance: +100, Elemental Resistance: +100%
Cooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Sparkle Burst
fifthMain.shortDesc: Summons an orb that grants 6 sec of invincibility, the orb explodes 3 times after 30 sec or when used again, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 900%, Number of Attacks: 15.\nAll attack skills except Soul Buster further enhance orb invincibility duration and powers, up to 2 stages, with each stage increasing the Final Damage by 100%, and the invincibility duration by 2 sec.\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an orb that grants brief invincibility when activated. At the end of the duration or when the Skill Key is pressed again, the orb explodes damaging nearby enemies
details: All attacks except will charge the orb, increasing its %Final Damage and the invincibility duration (up to 2 stages)

fifthMain.name: Superstar Spotlight
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Installs 3 spotlights that shine on you for 30 sec. Each spotlight deals 800% damage 3 times to up to 15 enemies within its area.
While you are within the spotlight, you gain Status Resistance +25, Critical Rate +15%, and Final Damage +5%.
You receive a separate bonus for each spotlight, up to 3 buffs. The Final Damage bonus is calculated cumulatively for each spotlight.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: 3 Spotlights appear on the screen, shining light at your location. The spotlights will deal damage to enemies inside it and provides a stacking buff if you are in it
details:
If you are within the spotlight, you gain %Crit Rate, %Final Damage (additive), and Abnormal Status Resistance
  • Each spotlight will grant the buff (stacking up to 3 times)
Enemies can take damage from multiple spotlights
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the skill's background music
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Mighty Mascot
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Duration: 35 sec. When successfully recharged, uses Twinkle Star or Magical Balloon. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 5. Cannot be used in the middle of another action.
Use Twinkle Star or Magical Bubble, or acquire 1 Magical Bubble every 3 sec. Up to 8 can be held at a time.
Use the skill once more to cast Shiny Bubble Breath. Duration: 3 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 8.
All Magical Bubbles will be consumed upon use of Shiny Bubble Breath. Duration is increased by 0.4 sec for every bubble. Can be used once while summoned. Skill ends only after all Bubbles are used up, even if the summon duration ends beforehand.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: When summoned, whenever your battery recharges, Mighty Mascot will attack
details: The attacks will generate a resource called 'Magical Bubbles' if they land (up to 8 at a time) and periodically every few seconds

Pressing the Skill Key again will consume all Magical Bubbles to create a breath attack
  • The duration of the attack is increased for each Magical Bubble consumed
  • The attack only ends after all the Magical Bubbles are consumed and will keep going even if the summon expires
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Trinity Fusion
fifthMain.shortDesc:
A dragon's enemy attacks 7 enemies, for 355% damage, 3 times. 9 attack(s) will occur in total.
While casting this skill, any attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of Max HP will suffer a -17% damage penalty.
Cooldown: 14 sec
[Passive Effect: DEX +35]
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a powerful blast attack around you
details: [Passive]: Grants flat DEX
While casting, gain increased %Damage Reduction against %Max HP attacks and cannot be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF a function to activate the skill by pressing Down Arrow Key and together

masteryCore.name: HEXA Trinity
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 1020%, Number of Attacks: 6\nHEXA Trinity/Trinity Fusion Damage and Ignore Defense: +15%, Duration: 30 sec, Max Stacks:

originSkill.name: Grand Finale
originSkill.shortDesc:
Invincible during casting, applies Affinity effect for 20 sec
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 4800%, Number of Attacks: 8, Sound Waves: 3. Afterwards, Damage: 7200%, Number of Attacks: 14, Cannon Roars: 7
25 Cheering Balloons soar at the concert's grand finale and target enemies.
After the concert ends, Soul Seeker changes to Cheering Balloons for 30 sec.
Cheering Balloons - Damage: 680%. Has the same chance as Soul Seeker to regenerate upon hit, attacking up to 7 times.
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Angelic Buster is DEX pirate class part of the Nova class group. Angelic Busters skills do not use any MP and does not have a MP resource. Instead, the class has a special resource called Soul Battery that some skills require you to charge to use. Your Soul Battery can be recharged by attacking enemies
